properties.name: ADOBESINGLELINE
properties.description: Offers a traditional approach to composing type one line at a time. Useful if you prefer to have manual control over how lines break.

properties.name: ADOBEEVERYLINE
properties.description: Considers a network of break points for a range of lines and thus optimizes earlier lines in the paragraph to eliminate especially unattractive breaks later on. Results in more even spacing and fewer hyphens.
